news_header: In Sweden, the Gothenburg District Court has sentenced individuals involved in reporting and collecting pedophiles.
news_text: The Gothenburg District Court in Sweden has sentenced four men and one woman for assault and robbery. The convicted individuals had posed as a 14-year-old girl on social media to lure men to a specific location, where they were then assaulted and robbed. The incidents were filmed and shared on social media. The group known as Pedophile Hunters Sweden claims they are targeting child predators. The sentences were handed down between February and April.
